system.summary: Turn a blank book into a new book of spells.

description.value: Should a Wizard lose their @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.L4TCBW3PWUZVSULN]{Book of Spells} and have to write a new one, they can do so as a Long Rest Action with a new and empty spellbook or any suitable medium—though any improvised option will be less durable than a proper spellbook. During this process, they can copy down all of the spells they know. Spells that you don’t know but had temporarily prepared due to spell scrolls or spellpages that were tucked into your old spellbook are not recovered.
